articles.title: Kilmarnock 2-1 Partick Thistle: Kilmarnock stretch lead over Arbroath to four points - BBC
articles.description: Kyle Lafferty scores twice as Kilmarnock stretch their lead at the top of the Scottish Championship to four points.
articles.content:
Kyle Lafferty has scored seven goals for Kilmarnock
Kyle Lafferty scored twice as Kilmarnock beat Partick Thistle to extend their lead at the top of the Scottish Championship to four points.
